text: Robert Pierre Sarrabére (August 30, 1926 - January 11, 2017) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1950, Serrabére served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Aire et Dax, France, from 1978 to 2002. He had served as coadjutor of the diocese from 1975 to 1978.Diocese of Aire et Dax ==Notes== Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French Roman Catholic bishops
title: Robert Pierre Sarrabère
